channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - monthly

item.title: Gentoo Hardened spring notes
item.description:
We got back together on the #gentoo-hardened chat channel to discuss the progress of Gentoo Hardened, so it's time for another write-up of what was said.

Toolchain

GCC 4.8.1 will be out soon, although nothing major has occurred with it since the last meeting. There is a plugin â€¦
